_meta.source: Researched from Abu Dhabi Tourism, cruise port guides, and local sources

bbox_hint.note: Covers port, Grand Mosque, Corniche, Yas Island

transit_routes.name: Taxi to Grand Mosque
transit_routes.note: Essential visit. Free admission, free abayas provided for women.

transit_routes.name: Taxi to Yas Island
transit_routes.note: Theme parks, F1 circuit. Full day destination.

transit_routes.name: Taxi to Louvre Abu Dhabi
transit_routes.note: Saadiyat Island cultural district. World-class museum.

featured_experiences.name: Grand Mosque Visit
featured_experiences.note: Free admission. Modest dress required (abayas provided). Guided tours available.

featured_experiences.name: Yas Island Thrills
featured_experiences.note: Combo tickets save money. Formula Rossa hits 240 km/h.

featured_experiences.name: Louvre & Cultural Day
featured_experiences.note: 63 AED entry. Combine with Saadiyat Beach for full day.
